text: Montagny is a municipality of the district of Broye in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. == History == Since 2000 the municipality was created when Montagny-les-Monts and Montagny-la-Ville merged.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 On 1 January 2004, the former municipality of Mannens-Grandsivaz merged into the municipality of Montagny (FR).Nomenklaturen â€“ Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2000s establishments in Switzerland Category:2000 establishments in Europe Category:Municipalities in Broye
title: Montagny, Fribourg
